statements: SELECT * FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT patient_name, gender, diagnosis FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE blood_type = 'O+' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_id, height, weight FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE gender = 'Male' AND height >= 160 ORDER BY weight ASC;
SELECT patient_name, blood_type FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE blood_type IN ('A+', 'B+');
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT * FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE blood_type = 'O-'
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE height BETWEEN 160 AND 180 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT * FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01' AND weight > 70
SELECT patient_name, blood_type, height, weight FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%infection%' ORDER BY weight DESC
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_dob DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_address FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT patient_name, prescription FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE diagnosis = 'Fever';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_dob DESC;
SELECT record_date, diagnosis, prescription FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%COVID%';
SELECT Patients.patient_id, Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM MedicalRecords WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, dob FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT doctor_name, diagnosis, prescription FROM medical_records WHERE record_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT test_name, result_text, result_date FROM lab_results ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob FROM patients WHERE dob >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT patients.first_name, patients.last_name, medical_records.record_date, medical_records.diagnosis FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;

SELECT patients.first_name, patients.last_name, medical_records.record_date, lab_results.test_name, lab_results.result_text FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id JOIN lab_results ON medical_records.record_id = lab_results.record_id WHERE lab_results.result_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY medical_records.record_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT patients.gender, COUNT(patients.patient_id) AS num_patients FROM patients GROUP BY patients.gender HAVING COUNT(patients.patient_id) > 5 ORDER BY num_patients DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment FROM MedicalRecords WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications WHERE dosage > '100mg';
SELECT patient_id, appointment_date, doctor_name FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-01-01';
SELECT P.first_name, P.last_name, M.diagnosis, M.treatment FROM Patients P JOIN MedicalRecords M ON P.patient_id = M.patient_id;
SELECT A.patient_id, A.appointment_date, A.doctor_name, A.notes, P.first_name, P.last_name FROM Appointments A JOIN Patients P ON A.patient_id = P.patient_id ORDER BY A.appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, dob FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT record_id, doctor_name, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT test_name, result, units FROM LabResults WHERE date_tested > '2022-01-01';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications WHERE start_date < '2022-03-15';
SELECT name, gender, dob FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY dob DESC
SELECT doctor_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM MedicalRecords WHERE date_created BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY record_id ASC
SELECT test_name, result, units FROM LabResults WHERE date_tested < '2021-06-01' ORDER BY result DESC
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications WHERE start_date >= '2021-10-01' ORDER BY patient_id
SELECT doctor_name, appointment_date, purpose FROM Appointments WHERE status = 'Confirmed' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC
